item.title: Pelican crossing slow to change, 21st July
item.description:
The new dedicated pelican crossing on the west carriageway can often take an excess amount of time to change resulting in people dangerously sprinting across the road when they get fed up of waiting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Miserden Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Inadequate road hazzard warning, 21st July
item.description:
The original thin black post (as in the rest of Cromwell Rd) were not properly marked until my vehicle had had the collision and been written off, due to being under the shade of a large tree and just after heavy rain and bright sunshine The offending post has been replaced by the Council but the other three sights on the same rd have been left in what I consider a 'dangerous condition. The Council have admitted this by replacing the offendin post with the correct one.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 155 Cromwell Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
